name: Cosmic Bounce
overview: You are the pilot of the Plasmobile, and your task is to protect the vital energy source which is under attack by the Doovries. Your weapon is a plasma cannon which fires a plasma ball of indestructible energy capable of destroying everything in its path. Once fired, the plasma will continue to wreak havoc until it is recovered by your Plasmobile. it must not be allowed to destroy the energy source or you will have failed in your mission. You have nine lives, and occasionally have to ram a Doovry to protect the energy source. Play in English. Mode d'emploi en Francais. Gebrauchsanweisung auf Deutsch.
